about_the_game:
This is the "Classic Original Soundtrack" created to commemorate the release of LOLLIPOP CHAINSAW RePOP.

The "Classic Original Soundtrack" is packed with all the "Original Lollipop Chainsaw Sound" composed by Akira Yamaoka, a renowned composer who has produced numerous outstanding game soundtracks.

Additionally, this "Classic Original Soundtrack" is the first soundtrack release since the original Lollipop Chainsaw in 2012. The 44 tracks, recorded specifically for the game, are a rare collector's item available exclusively on Steam.

Don't miss this opportunity to get your copy!
